content.prompt:
• Letters written by Franciscan friars

  • Pictorial records of the Mexica

  • Statues produced by local artists in New Spain

  • Histories written in Spanish and Nahuatl

A historian examining Mesoamerica in the sixteenth century would best utilize the sources above to analyze which of the following topics?

choices.label: How Christian ideas were communicated to and understood by Amerindians
Conflicts between the Jesuits and the Franciscans
The extent of the decline of the Amerindian population

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
